org.jsonurl

Interface JsonUrlOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseJsonUrlOptions, JsonUrlParser, JsonUrlParser, JsonUrlParser, JsonUrlStringBuilder, JsonUrlTextAppender, Parser, ValueFactoryParser, ValueFactoryParser.TransparentBuilder

    public interface JsonUrlOptions
    An interface for common input/output options.
    Since:
    2020-10-21
    Author:
    jsonurl.org, David MacCormack

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • isFormUrlEncoded

        default boolean isFormUrlEncoded()
        Test if the wfu-composite/wfu-implied-composite option is enabled. If this option is enabled then application/x-www-form-urlencoded style separators are allowed for an implied top-level object or array.
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isFormUrlEncoded

        static boolean isFormUrlEncoded(JsonUrlOptions opt)
        Test if the wfu-composite/wfu-implied-composite option is enabled, supplying the default value if necessary.
        Parameters:
        opt - a valid JsonUrlOptions or null
        See Also:
        isFormUrlEncoded()

      • isImpliedStringLiterals

        default boolean isImpliedStringLiterals()
        Test if the implied-string-literals option is enabled. If this option is enabled then all literals are assumed to be strings.
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isImpliedStringLiterals

        static boolean isImpliedStringLiterals(JsonUrlOptions opt)
        Test if the implied-string-literals option is enabled, supplying the default value if necessary.
        Parameters:
        opt - a valid JsonUrlOptions or null
        See Also:
        isImpliedStringLiterals()

      • isEmptyUnquotedKeyAllowed

        default boolean isEmptyUnquotedKeyAllowed()
        Test if the empty-unquoted-key option is enabled. If this option is enabled then the empty string may be represented via a zero length value. Otherwise, two single quotes must be used: ''.
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isEmptyUnquotedKeyAllowed

        static boolean isEmptyUnquotedKeyAllowed(JsonUrlOptions opt)
        Test if the empty-unquoted-key option is enabled, supplying the default value if necessary.
        Parameters:
        opt - a valid JsonUrlOptions or null
        See Also:
        isEmptyUnquotedKeyAllowed()

      • isEmptyUnquotedValueAllowed

        default boolean isEmptyUnquotedValueAllowed()
        Test if the empty-unquoted-value option is enabled. If this option is enabled then the empty string may be represented via a zero length key. Otherwise, two single quotes must be used: ''.
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isEmptyUnquotedValueAllowed

        static boolean isEmptyUnquotedValueAllowed(JsonUrlOptions opt)
        Test if the empty-unquoted-value option is enabled, supplying the default value if necessary.
        Parameters:
        opt - a valid JsonUrlOptions or null
        See Also:
        isEmptyUnquotedValueAllowed()

      • isSkipNulls

        default boolean isSkipNulls()
        Test if the skip-nulls option is enabled. If this option is enabled then null values in the input or output will be removed.
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isSkipNulls

        static boolean isSkipNulls(JsonUrlOptions opt)
        Test if the skip-nulls option is enabled, supplying the default value if necessary.
        Parameters:
        opt - a valid JsonUrlOptions or null
        See Also:
        isSkipNulls()

      • fromObject

        static JsonUrlOptions fromObject(Object obj)
        Cast an object to JsonUrlOptions.
        Parameters:
        obj - a valid object or null
        Returns:
        obj if it is an instance of JsonUrlOptions; otherwise, null.
